name: Aceternity UI
description: Tabs to switch content, click on a tab to check background animation.

props.Description: An array of Tab objects. Each Tab object has title, value, and content properties.
Optional. CSS class name for the container div.
Optional. CSS class name for the active tab.
Optional. CSS class name for the tab.
Optional. CSS class name for the content div.

usage_notes: Tabs to switch content, click on a tab to check background animation.
